metadata.title: CVE-2024-0450 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was found in the CPython `zipfile` module affecting versions3.12.1, 3.11.7, 3.10.13, 3.9.18, and 3.8.18 and prior. The zipfile moduleis vulnerable to “quoted-overlap” zip-bombs which exploit the zip format tocreate a zip-bomb with a high compression ratio. The fixed versions ofCPython makes the zipfile module reject zip archives which overlap entriesin the archive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0450` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

idle-python3.12 - 3.12.4-1ubuntu1
libpython3.12-minimal - 3.12.4-1ubuntu1
libpython3.12-stdlib - 3.12.4-1ubuntu1
libpython3.12-testsuite - 3.12.4-1ubuntu1
libpython3.12t64 - 3.12.4-1ubuntu1
python3.12 - 3.12.4-1ubuntu1
python3.12-examples - 3.12.4-1ubuntu1
python3.12-full - 3.12.4-1ubuntu1
python3.12-minimal - 3.12.4-1ubuntu1
python3.12-nopie - 3.12.4-1ubuntu1
python3.12-venv - 3.12.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python3.12 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.12.4-1ubuntu1').
